text: The Meidericher Spielverein 02 e. V. Duisburg is a football club which plays in Germany. The club was founding member of the German Bundesliga 1962/63 and is now playing in the Second Bundesliga. Due to their striped jerseys they are also called the "Zebras". == Name == The club was founded in 1902 as Meidericher SV. On 9 January 1967 the club was renamed into his still today valid name MSV Duisburg. == Current squad == As of 1 November 2011 Category:Duisburg Category:Football clubs in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:1902 establishments in Europe Category:1900s establishments in Germany
title: MSV Duisburg
